entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Rocky Mountain House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:39 a.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: SE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local smoke. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
